author: Arsene Lupin III
subject: The New FAQ
body:
Well, I stopped by. I like the notebook paper-type BG. I enjoyed the
piece of article from Toon Magazine (if only you could type the whole
thing). Also nice are the Japanese fonts for each character name
(although MS IE 5 kept asking me to download some files to be able to
read it).

But it has one minor flaw: how do non-members of the Lupin ML find it?!
You can't find it through the Anime Video Games Resource Center, and not
from your name itself. By the way, how come you cannot link to the AVGRC
from .../cruzl/? All it says is "Hi. My name is Luis Cruz. I go to
such-and-such school and plan to major in such-and-such." I'm very
surprised you don't have links to any of your sub-directories from there.
Perhaps a good suggestion...?

Other than that, great revamp. I didn't have time to look at the new
animes and all, but I got the jist. I would like to mention, however,
that I was planning on *really* revamping the little bugger... (Y'know,
an extremely long links page, lots of custom art scanned-in, new film
reviews, editorials... basically what I was planning on slapping into my
site, but with the classic info to back it up). I'm still open to ideas
on a two-man project....
